effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.5 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 769,332.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,150 to 9,961 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 302 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,494, further increased by 918 while you remain within its light.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Burgundy Tuskarr Trader's Pack

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
